The progresse of divine providence, set out in a sermon preached in the Abbey Church of Westminster before the house of Peers, on the 24th of September, 1645. being the day of their monethly fast. / By William Gouge, one of the members of the Assembly. Gouge, William, 1578-1653.
[8], 40 p.
Printed by G.M. for Ioshua Kirton next Goldsmiths-hall in Foster-lane, London, : MDCXLV. [1645]
Order to print on verso of first leaf. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
